thread.title: Watch Drake Preview a New Song at ‘Boy Meets World’ Tour Opener
thread.title_full: Watch Drake Preview a New Song at ‘Boy Meets World’ Tour Opener

author: Jake Boyer
title: Watch Drake Preview a New Song at ‘Boy Meets World’ Tour Opener
text:
After multiple delays, and some very public planning to restart his acting career , Drake finally kicked off his ‘Boy Meets World’ Tour in Amsterdam over the weekend. And as a reward for all the fans who had their concert abruptly postponed, Drizzy gifted everyone with a brand new track. Watch him sing it in the concert footage below.

Currently untitled, the song will appear on Drake’s enigmatic upcoming full-length More Life . He has recently discussed in an episode of the podcast Cal Cast that the project is less of an album proper and more of a mixtape, or in his words, “a body of work that I’m creating to bridge the gap between my major releases.” Listen to him discuss it below.

Stay tuned for further details on More Life to emerge. In the meantime, here’s a great video of his performance of “Hotline Bling” from his new tour:
Hotline Bling in Amsterdam. #BoyMeetsWorldTour pic.twitter.com/cJRgxBprqy 
— Word On Road (@WordOnRd) January 28, 2017 

In other music news, A$AP Rocky has dropped a new track inspired by Calvin Klein’s own Raf Simons. Listen to it right here .
